content.rendered:
All of our nominations were turned into Stars at the APMC awards last Friday night at the Marker.

Three golds, six silver and two bronze landed us 11 Stars in all, with 3 category wins among them: 

48’s Ditch and Switch for Best Media, IT and Telecoms

Jose Cuervo’s Day of the Dead for Best Experiential for a budget under €30k

3Disco for Best Sponsorship activation

This is an awesome result, particularly because there was stiff competition in all of our nominated categories.

We’d like to extend congratulations to Guns or Knives who took home the Grand Prix on the night.

Buzzing for next year already!
